snippet: Bohuslav Sobotka, a former finance minister known for his uncharismatic personal style, was expected to become prime minister.
abstract: Bohuslav Sobotka, former leftist finance minister in the Czech Republic, is expected to become prime minister after three political parties sign an agreement to form a center-left coalition government.
lead_paragraph: Bohuslav Sobotka, a former finance minister known for his uncharismatic personal style, was expected to become prime minister.

headline.main: Czech Parties Agree to Form Center-Left Coalition
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Parties Sign a Deal
